程序包 com.example.a301groupproject.ui.home

类 HomeViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
com.example.a301groupproject.ui.home.HomeViewModel
public class HomeViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
ViewModel to manage UI-related data in the lifecycle of the HomeFragment. It offers an interface to interact with the Firestore database, to add, remove, and edit items, and to manage image URIs for items. It abstracts the data management from the HomeFragment, allowing for a separation of concerns and easier testing.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getImages

      public androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData<ArrayList<String>> getImages()
      Retrieves the live data instance containing the list of image URIs.
      返回:
      The MutableLiveData object containing the list of image URIs.

    • addImage

      public void addImage(String imageUrl)
      Adds a new image URI to the existing list of image URIs in the MutableLiveData.
      参数:
      imageUrl - The new image URL to add to the list.

    • getDeleteImages

      public androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData<ArrayList<String>> getDeleteImages()
      Retrieves the live data instance containing the list of deleted image URIs.
      返回:
      The MutableLiveData object containing the list of deleted image URIs.

    • addDeleteImage

      public void addDeleteImage(String imageUrl)
      Adds a new image URI to the existing list of deleted image URIs in the MutableLiveData.
      参数:
      imageUrl - The new image URL to add to the deleted list.

    • removeDeleteImage

      public void removeDeleteImage(String imageUrl)

    • emptyImages

      public void emptyImages()
      Clears the list of image URIs, setting an empty list in the MutableLiveData.

    • emptyDeletedImages

      public void emptyDeletedImages()
      Clears the list of deleted image URIs, setting an empty list in the MutableLiveData.

    • getItems

      public androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData<ArrayList<Item>> getItems()
      Gets the live data list of items. It initializes or updates the list of items from Firestore when changes occur. It listens to the Firestore snapshot updates and keeps the items list updated.
      返回:
      The MutableLiveData object containing the current list of items.

    • getTheItems

      public androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData<ArrayList<Item>> getTheItems()
      Retrieves the MutableLiveData containing the list of Items. This method returns the current local MutableLiveData instance that holds the current list of items without calling databases.
      返回:
      The MutableLiveData containing the list of items.

    • addItem

      public void addItem(Item item, ArrayList<String> imageUris)
      Adds a new item to the Firestore database. It compiles the item data into a map and uploads it to the database.
      参数:
      item - The item to add to the database.
      imageUris - The list of strings representing image URIs to associate with the item.

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem(Item item)
      Remove an item in the Firestore database with the provided data.
      参数:
      item - The item to be remove by identify its unique id in the Firebase

    • editItem

      public void editItem(Item item, ArrayList<String> imageUris)
      Edits an item in the Firestore database with the provided data.
      参数:
      item - The item to be edited, containing updated information.
      imageUris - The list of image URIs associated with the item.

    • addTagToItem

      public void addTagToItem(Item item, ArrayList<String> tags)
      Adds tags to an item and updates the corresponding data in the Firestore database. This method takes an item and a list of tags, updates the item's tags, and then updates the corresponding document in the Firestore database for the current user.
      参数:
      item - The item to which tags are to be added.
      tags - The list of new tags to be added to the item.

    • calculateTotalValue

      public double calculateTotalValue()
      Calculates the total value of all items by summing their individual values. Handles NumberFormatException if a value is not a valid double.
      返回:
      The total value of all items as a double.

    • setItemsValue

      public void setItemsValue(ArrayList<Item> i)
